content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify one claim made by the author regarding decolonization. b) Explain one development before the Second World War that influenced European decolonization. c) Explain a significant limitation of the author’s argument regarding the political decisions made by European powers regarding decolonization.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
